channel.title: Amit's Lab on Shantanu Vs The World
channel.description: Recent content in Amit's Lab on Shantanu Vs The World

item.title: A New Resource For Reverse Engineering (and more)...
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: My brother “Amit Goel” has started a tech blog, primarily about Reverse Engineering nuances, but he plans to write much more. Pay him a visit at Amit’s Lab and let him know what topics you want him to discuss about.
item.content: My brother “Amit Goel” has started a tech blog, primarily about Reverse Engineering nuances, but he plans to write much more. Pay him a visit at Amit’s Lab and let him know what topics you want him to discuss about.
